Package ss.project.server

Class CollectoClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.project.server.CollectoClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class CollectoClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A client handler to communicate with the client, also stores its own BoardGame. A model class as it stores information about the client and its current game situation. It can be argued that the client handler is also doing a partial controller job, as it interprets commands coming from the user.
    Author:
    Alex Petrov (s2478412) and Kagan Gulsum (s2596091)

                             java.lang.String name,

        Constructs a new CollectoClientHandler. Opens the In- and OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        sock - The client socket
        srv - The connected server
        name - The name of this ClientHandler

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Continuously listens to client input and forwards the input to the handleCommand(String) method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String str)
        A method to send the MOVE messages to the clients. (sometimes used to send ERROR messages as well)
        Parameters:
        newMove - The move message
        Requires
        newMove != null

      • doMove

        public void doMove​(int move1,
                   int move2)
        The method to process the moves sent by the client. Synchronized over the game that is played. The moves are always checked for legality.
        Parameters:
        move1 - The first move
        move2 - The second move
        Requires
        move1 >= 0 && 27 >= move1 && move2 >= -1 && 27 >= move2

      • doGameOver

        public void doGameOver()
        A method to check if the game is over. If the game is over, the client handlers' inGame field will be set to false, and a game over message will be sent.

      • doGameOverDisconnect

        public void doGameOverDisconnect()
        A method to send the game over message in case of a disconnection.
